import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItemsTotal, selectCartItems } from '../../redux/cart/cartSelectors' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkoutitem/CheckoutItem' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripecheckoutbutton/StripeCheckoutButton' import './CheckOutPage.scss' const CheckOutPage = ({ cartItems, total, removeItem }) => { return (
Product
Description
quantity
Price
Remove
{cartItems.map(cartItem => ())}
TOTAL: ${total}
Please use the following test credit card for payments
4242 4242 4242 4242 - Exp: 01/21 - CVV: 123
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartItemsTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckOutPage)
